item.description:
Let's get together, enjoy a beer, and speak some Portuguese!

I am going to limit the number of participants but I obviously won't turn anyone away. If people are up for it we can also play a game or two which will definitely be a blast after a few beers (plus we'll improve our vocabularies while we're at it).

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Practice Portuguese com uma cerveja
